item.title: Snap4Waste
item.description: Introduction Snap4Waste is an algorithm for locating and optimizing garbage truck routes in Amsterdam, using only measurements made in the years 2020 and 2021. Authors Mirco Ceccarelli Pietro Zarri Relators Prof. Paolo Nesi Dott. Alessandro Luciano Ipsaro Palesi Dott. Enrico Collini Some Outputs Some output images created by the algorithm: Map of underground containers divided by capacity. Measures trend on 30 December 2021.
